Translations.Text: Yakshcho b BOH hastened retribution zaznatyy lyudʹmy, shlyakh vony vymahayutʹ umov, vony buly by vynyshcheni davno. Ale, my lyshayemo tsi khto ne virymo v zustrichayuchym nam u yikhnikh porushenni, blundering

Koly neshchastya torkayetʹsya lyudsʹkyy buduchy, vin blahaye nas toy chas, yak lyahayuchy, abo zasidannya, abo vstayuche. Ale yak tilʹky my relieve yoho neshchastya, vin prodovzhuyetʹsya tak, yakby vin nikoly ne blahav nas relieve budʹ-yaki neharazdy! Pratsi porushnykiv takym chynom prykrashayutʹsya u yikhnikh ochakh
Bahato heneratsiyi my vynyshchyly pered tym, yak vy koly vony porushyly. Yikhni kur'yery poyikhaly yim z yasnymy dokazamy, ale vony vidmovylysya poviryty. My takym chynom requite vynuvati lyudy
Todi my zrobyly vam inheritors zemli pislya nykh, shchob pobachyty yak vy zrobyte

Koly nashi vidkryttya deklamuyutʹsya yim, tsey khto ne ochikuyutʹ zustrity nas kazhutʹ, "Prynosyatʹ Quran za vynyatkom tse, abo minyayutʹ tse!" Skazhitʹ, "ya ne mozhu mozhlyvo zminyty tse na moyomu vlasne. YA prosto slidkuyu shcho vidkryvayetʹsya do meni. YA bo, yakshcho ya ne pidkoryayusya moyomu Lordu, retribution awesome denʹ

Kazhu, "Mav BOHA willed, ya by ne deklamuvav tse do vas, ne chy ne mohly b vy znaly budʹ shcho pro tse. YA prozhyv sered vas vse zhyttya pered tse (ta vy znaly meni yak normalʹna, pravdyva osoba). Vy ne rozumiyete
Khto ye bilʹshe z·hubnyy nizh odyn khto vyhotovlyaye brekhnyu pro BOHA, abo vidkhylyaye Yoho vidkryttya. Zvychayno, porushnyky nikoly ne mayutʹ uspikh

Vony obozhnyuyutʹ bilya idoliv BOHA shcho volodiyutʹ niyakoyu potuzhnistyu ne zavdaty shkody yim abo yim vyhody, ta yak kazhutʹ, "Tse - nashi poserednyky u BOHU!" Skazhitʹ, vy informuyete BOHA shchosʹ Vin ne znaye u nebi abo zemli?" Vin glorified. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Vysokyy; daleko nahori potrebuyuchyy partneriv
lyudy zvychayno buly odyn congregation, todi vony posperechalysya. Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya predetermined slovo z vashoho Lorda, vony by sudylysʹ nehayno vidnosno yikhnikh superechok
Yak kazhutʹ, "Yak prybuvayutʹ niyake chudo ne prybulo vnyz yomu z yoho Lorda?" Skazhitʹ, maybutnye nalezhytʹ BOHU; tak chekaty, ta ya chekayu razom z vamy
